nodes.long_description:
Pauer View, lets you view your 2D and 360° photos taken on a 360 Camera without having to use a desktop computer to transfer your pictures to your Meta Quest VR headset.

Enjoy your VR pictures with your family and friends using your Meta Quest VR headset as a gallery for your 360 degree pictures quickly and simply. Create slideshows quickly and start sharing your memories!

Explicitly supported devices:
* GoPro Max
* Insta360
* HTTP image servers

To find out more visit: https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

We will be adding more as we learn about them, so if your camera is missing, email us at pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Pauer View allows you to view your 360° photos simply and quickly from a 360° Camera without a PC.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View, vous permet de visualiser vos photos 2D et 360° prises sur une caméra 360 sans avoir à utiliser un ordinateur de bureau pour transférer vos photos sur votre casque Meta Quest VR.

Profitez de vos photos VR avec votre famille et vos amis en utilisant votre casque Meta Quest VR comme galerie pour vos photos à 360 degrés rapidement et simplement. Créez rapidement des diaporamas et commencez à partager vos souvenirs !

Appareils explicitement pris en charge :
*GoPro Max
*Insta360
* Serveurs d'images HTTP

Pour en savoir plus, visitez : https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

Nous en ajouterons d'autres au fur et à mesure que nous en apprendrons davantage, donc si votre appareil photo est manquant, envoyez-nous un e-mail à pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Pauer View vous permet de visualiser vos photos 360° simplement et rapidement depuis une Caméra 360° sans PC.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View le permite ver sus fotos en 2D y 360° tomadas con una cámara 360 sin tener que usar una computadora de escritorio para transferir sus imágenes a sus auriculares Meta Quest VR.

Disfrute de sus imágenes de realidad virtual con su familia y amigos utilizando sus auriculares Meta Quest VR como galería para sus imágenes de 360 ​​grados de forma rápida y sencilla. ¡Crea presentaciones de diapositivas rápidamente y comienza a compartir tus recuerdos!

Dispositivos explícitamente compatibles:
*GoPro Max
* Insta360
* Servidores de imágenes HTTP

Para obtener más información, visite: https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

Agregaremos más a medida que sepamos sobre ellos, así que si falta su cámara, envíenos un correo electrónico a pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Pauer View te permite ver tus fotos de 360° de forma sencilla y rápida desde una Cámara de 360° sin necesidad de PC.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View 讓您可以查看 360 度相機拍攝的 2D 和 360° 照片，而無需使用桌上型電腦將照片傳輸到 Meta Quest VR 耳機。

使用 Meta Quest VR 耳機作為 360 度圖片庫，快速、簡單地與家人和朋友一起欣賞 VR 圖片。 快速建立幻燈片並開始分享您的回憶！

明確支援的設備：
* GoPro 最大
* Insta360
* HTTP圖像伺服器

要了解更多信息，請訪問：https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

隨著我們對它們的了解，我們將添加更多內容，因此如果您的相機遺失，請發送電子郵件至 pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Pauer View 讓您可以透過 360° 相機簡單快速地查看 360° 照片，而無需使用 PC。

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View, ti consente di visualizzare le tue foto 2D e a 360° scattate su una fotocamera 360 senza dover utilizzare un computer desktop per trasferire le tue immagini sul visore Meta Quest VR.

Goditi le tue foto VR con la tua famiglia e i tuoi amici utilizzando il visore Meta Quest VR come galleria per le tue foto a 360 gradi in modo rapido e semplice. Crea rapidamente presentazioni e inizia a condividere i tuoi ricordi!

Dispositivi esplicitamente supportati:
* GoPro Max
*Insta360
* Server di immagini HTTP

Per saperne di più visita: https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

Ne aggiungeremo altri man mano che ne verremo a conoscenza, quindi se manca la tua fotocamera, inviaci un'e-mail a pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Pauer View ti consente di visualizzare le tue foto a 360° in modo semplice e rapido da una fotocamera a 360° senza PC.

nodes.long_description:
Mit Pauer View können Sie Ihre mit einer 360°-Kamera aufgenommenen 2D- und 360°-Fotos ansehen, ohne dass Sie einen Desktop-Computer verwenden müssen, um Ihre Bilder auf Ihr Meta Quest VR-Headset zu übertragen.

Genießen Sie Ihre VR-Bilder mit Ihrer Familie und Freunden, indem Sie Ihr Meta Quest VR-Headset schnell und einfach als Galerie für Ihre 360-Grad-Bilder nutzen. Erstellen Sie schnell Diashows und teilen Sie Ihre Erinnerungen!

Ausdrücklich unterstützte Geräte:
* GoPro Max
* Insta360
* HTTP-Bildserver

Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter: https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

Wir werden weitere hinzufügen, sobald wir davon erfahren. Wenn Ihre Kamera fehlt, senden Sie uns eine E-Mail an pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Mit Pauer View können Sie Ihre 360°-Fotos einfach und schnell von einer 360°-Kamera aus ansehen, ohne einen PC zu benötigen.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View を使用すると、デスクトップ コンピュータを使用して写真を Meta Quest VR ヘッドセットに転送しなくても、360 カメラで撮影した 2D および 360° 写真を表示できます。

Meta Quest VR ヘッドセットを 360 度写真のギャラリーとして使用して、家族や友人と一緒に VR 写真をすばやく簡単にお楽しみください。 スライドショーをすばやく作成して、思い出を共有しましょう。

明示的にサポートされているデバイス:
* ゴープロマックス
*インスタ360
* HTTP画像サーバー

詳細については、https://pauerview.softpauer.com/ をご覧ください。

情報が分かり次第さらに追加していきますので、カメラが見つからない場合は、pauerview@softpauer.com までメールでお問い合わせください。
nodes.short_description: Pauer View を使用すると、PC を使わずに 360° カメラからの 360° 写真を簡単かつ迅速に表示できます。

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View 可让您查看 360 度相机拍摄的 2D 和 360° 照片，而无需使用台式计算机将照片传输到 Meta Quest VR 耳机。

使用 Meta Quest VR 耳机作为 360 度图片库，快速、简单地与家人和朋友一起欣赏 VR 图片。 快速创建幻灯片并开始分享您的回忆！

明确支持的设备：
* GoPro 最大
* Insta360
* HTTP图像服务器

要了解更多信息，请访问：https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

随着我们对它们的了解，我们将添加更多内容，因此如果您的相机丢失，请发送电子邮件至 pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Pauer View 允许您通过 360° 相机简单快速地查看 360° 照片，而无需使用 PC。

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View, lets you view your 2D and 360° photos taken on a 360 Camera without having to use a desktop computer to transfer your pictures to your Meta Quest VR headset.

Enjoy your VR pictures with your family and friends using your Meta Quest VR headset as a gallery for your 360 degree pictures quickly and simply. Create slideshows quickly and start sharing your memories!

Supports flat, and 360 images, brightness, contrast, stitch point, locations and many other simple tweaks.

Explicitly supported devices:
* GoPro Max
* Insta360
* HTTP image servers

To find out more visit: https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

We will be adding more as we learn about them, so if your camera is missing, email us at pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: Pauer View allows you to view your photos and videos simply and quickly from a 360° Camera without needing a PC.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View를 사용하면 데스크탑 컴퓨터를 사용하여 사진을 Meta Quest VR 헤드셋으로 전송할 필요 없이 360 카메라로 촬영한 2D 및 360° 사진을 볼 수 있습니다.

Meta Quest VR 헤드셋을 360도 사진 갤러리로 빠르고 간단하게 사용하여 가족, 친구와 함께 VR 사진을 즐겨보세요. 빠르게 슬라이드쇼를 만들고 추억을 공유해 보세요!

명시적으로 지원되는 장치:
* 고프로 맥스
* 인스타360
* HTTP 이미지 서버

자세한 내용을 확인하려면 https://pauerview.softpauer.com/을 방문하세요.

이에 대해 더 많은 정보를 추가할 예정이므로 카메라가 없는 경우 pauerview@softpauer.com으로 이메일을 보내주세요.
nodes.short_description: Pauer View를 사용하면 PC 없이 360° 카메라로 360° 사진을 간단하고 빠르게 볼 수 있습니다.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View permite que você visualize suas fotos 2D e 360° tiradas em uma câmera 360 sem precisar usar um computador desktop para transferir suas fotos para seu headset Meta Quest VR.

Aproveite suas fotos VR com sua família e amigos usando seu fone de ouvido Meta Quest VR como uma galeria para suas fotos em 360 graus de forma rápida e simples. Crie apresentações de slides rapidamente e comece a compartilhar suas memórias!

Dispositivos explicitamente suportados:
* GoPro Max
* Insta360
* Servidores de imagem HTTP

Para saber mais acesse: https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

Adicionaremos mais à medida que aprendermos sobre eles, então se sua câmera estiver faltando, envie-nos um e-mail para pauerview@softpauer.com
nodes.short_description: O Pauer View permite que você visualize suas fotos 360° de forma simples e rápida a partir de uma Câmera 360° sem PC.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View, lets you view your 360-degree photos taken on a GoPro Max Camera without having to use a desktop computer to transfer your pictures to your Oculus Quest VR headset.

Enjoy your VR pictures with your family and friends using your Oculus Quest VR headset as a gallery for your 360 degree pictures taken on your Gopro Max 360 camera
nodes.short_description: Pauer View allows you to view your 360 photos simply and quickly from a GoPro Max Camera without a PC.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View を使用すると、デスクトップ コンピュータを使用して写真を Oculus Quest VR ヘッドセットに転送しなくても、GoPro Max カメラで撮影した 360 度の写真を表示できます。

Oculus Quest VR ヘッドセットを Gopro Max 360 カメラで撮影した 360 度写真のギャラリーとして使用して、家族や友人と一緒に VR 写真を楽しみましょう
nodes.short_description: Pauer View を使用すると、PC を使わずに GoPro Max カメラから 360 写真を簡単かつ迅速に表示できます。

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View를 사용하면 데스크톱 컴퓨터를 사용하여 사진을 Oculus Quest VR 헤드셋으로 전송할 필요 없이 GoPro Max 카메라로 촬영한 360도 사진을 볼 수 있습니다.

Oculus Quest VR 헤드셋을 Gopro Max 360 카메라로 촬영한 360도 사진 갤러리로 사용하여 가족 및 친구와 함께 VR 사진을 즐겨보세요.
nodes.short_description: Pauer View를 사용하면 PC 없이 GoPro Max 카메라에서 360도 사진을 간단하고 빠르게 볼 수 있습니다.

nodes.long_description:
Pauer View, lets you view your 360-degree photos taken on a GoPro Max Camera without having to use a desktop computer to transfer your pictures to your Oculus Quest VR headset.

Enjoy your VR pictures with your family and friends using your Oculus Quest VR headset as a gallery for your 360 degree pictures taken on your Gopro Max 360 camera
nodes.short_description: Pauer View allows you to view your 360 photos simply and quickly from a GoPro Max Camera without a PC.

nodes.change_log:
### Version 1.2 - 10/7/24

#### Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue where the continue button would not show when attempting to connect to GoPro
- Fixed an issued where no bluetooth device would show when attempting to scan for devices

Version 1.1 - 30/5/24

Additions

- Added support for 180 degree media (Single Fisheye)
- Added support for Insta360 X4
- Added a button to allow the user to skip the current downloading media

Reworks

- Downloads will now show show the following information
  - Progression of download
  - Current download speed
- Downloads that don't finish before closing the app can now be resumed by reconnecting to the camera
- Swapping a media's projection type has been merged into a multistate button
- Changed password text to better reflect changes from Insta360 X4

Bug Fixes

- Naming a slideshow to the same as an existing slideshow no longer softlocks the user
- Permissions are now requested consecutively
- 2D images now resize appropriately when changing projection type
- 2D images now correctly display portrait images
- Slideshows now removed from main menu once deleted
- Large shape that appeared in videos, blocking most of the view, is now gone
- Fixed memory leak when moving to next slide when a video was playing
- Fixed an issue that prevented the user from back-tracking after changing connected wifi

Version 1.0

Additions

- Added haptics for controllers
- Added support for sorting lists
- Added button to remove slide from show
- Can now manually change 3D image projection type
- Added video controls
- Added tooltips for controller buttons
- Added brightness, contrast and saturation controls to image
- Moved projection and advanced menus into the control bar
- Slideshows will now automatically prefill their name
- Added new editor and viewer modes
  - This will allow an editor to customize the viewable content in a slideshow for a viewer. The viewer mode has reduced functionality and is only able to move through the slideshow
- Added sort button to "Create slideshow" menu

Reworks

- Menu movement is snappier and is more tolerent to head movements before moving
- User can now continue using the app while downloading, clicking on the download bar will return the user to the download menu
- Made text bigger for easier viewing
- Menus are now much closer

Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue where permissions would constantly be requested
- Fixed a few of the visual states for buttons
- Fixed an issue where all images with dual fisheye projection were flipped

Known issues

- Downloading from a GoPro Max will sometimes fail the first time but will succeed on any attempts after
- Video handle won't move while dragging
- Dual fisheye videos sometimes out of sync
- Brightness contrast etc sliders don't always get remembered picture to picture
- White spots at the poles of the viewing area when viewing a video

### Version 0.9

- Added support for video
- Improved UX
- Added automatic image projection detection
  - This currently doesn't have a manual override but is planned to in the future
- Downloads will now happen in the background
  - The user must currently still wear the headset while downloads are occurring, this will be looked into for a future update
- Deselecting a slide from a slideshow should now prevent it from being shown when viewing the slideshow

#### Known issues

- Downloading from a GoPro Max will sometimes fail the first time but will succeed on any attempts after
- Ghosting and fractal effects on equirectangular and dual fisheye projection types

Version 0.8

- Fixed bluetooth connection issues
- Fixed an issue where the app would crash when repeatedly opening the 'New Slideshow' menu
- Fixed an issue where downloading from 2 separate cameras would show the images from both cameras, not just the most recent one
- Fixed an issue where downloading from a GoPro would always fail on the the 1st connection
- Fixed an issue where slideshows were being duplicated
- Fixed an issue where slideshows weren't being displayed on 1st load
